titles.title: I Was Made To Praise You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I was made to praise You. I was made to glorify Your Name In every circumstance, To find a chance to thank You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will always praise You. I will always glorify Your Name. In every circumstance, To find a chance to thank You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
